name: Brain-Test
description:
Brain-Test is a card matching game. In this game you will match cards and earn points and in game currency. 

 You will be able to compete with other players for the top score and time. With in-game currency you can buy chests that unlock more card skins and color themes

name: Minimum Wage
description:
Minimum Wage is a 2D top-down shooter game. The goal is simple, get as far as you can while avoiding guards and collecting new weapons and powerups. 

 It was developed to be compatible with Windows and Android. This was a school asigment where I had to work in a team of 4 people to make this game.

name: Easy-Ticket
description:
Easy-Ticket is a ticketing system website for events. It features an admin panel to manage events and their tickets.

 On the main page you will see all the events that are upcoming. There is a hisory section where you will be able to download your past tickets. Every event will have its own page where you will be able to see the event details and buy tickets.

name: Ormix quiz
description: Ormix is an online store for electronic appliances. I made a promotional quiz for it that featured a cupon code at the end of the quiz. I made it while intening at Firsof

name: Théorie du Meuble
description: Théorie du Meuble is a French designer furniture store. I made the company website for it. I made it while intening at Firsof

name: Fortuna Navale
description: Fortuna Navale is a shipbuilding company. I made the company website for it. I made it while intening at Firsof

name: inUnition
description: inUnition is my diploma project. It is a web and mobile productivity app with a focus on offline functionality and seamless syncing between devices.
